body_html:
It looks like you need to install the package

sudo apt-get install libcupti-dev

@gunan this looks like this is a new requirement. libcupti appears to be a dev profiling library. Not sure when we introduced this requirement.
body:
It looks like you need to install the package

```
sudo apt-get install libcupti-dev
```

@gunan this looks like this is a new requirement. `libcupti` appears to be a dev profiling library. Not sure when we introduced this requirement.
